recipe.title: Avocado and Mango Salad with Passion Fruit Vinaigrette
ingredients: 3 tablespoons frozen passion fruit juice concentrate, thawed
1 teaspoon whole coriander seeds, coarsely cracked
1 large ripe mango, halved, pitted, peeled, sliced
2 small avocados, halved, pitted, peeled, sliced
instructions: Whisk first 5 ingredients in small bowl to blend; gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing generously with salt and pepper. Toss salad mix in large bowl with 1/4 cup dressing. Divide salad among 4 plates. Tuck mango and avocado into salad; drizzle some of remaining dressing over mango and avocado.
